content: I cannot have an opinion, but modern art definitely serves a different purpose than the religiously-centered art of the late middle ages. the aim of modern art can vary significantly depending on the particular artist, movement or work of art. while some artists may want to create art that is aesthetically pleasing, it is common for modern art to also carry political, social or personal messages. modern art can be used to challenge traditional cultural beliefs or to interrogate contemporary political or social issues. it can also be used to express the artist's innermost thoughts or emotions, to critique society or to experiment with new media or forms.
